external_games.name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: Ruins Of Limis
The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: Ruins Of Limis
The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: Ruins Of Limis

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Ruins of Limis
storyline:
Everyone’s favourite unlikely heroes are back, and this time they’re caught in a conflict between a coven of Vampires and a band of Necromancers. Grab your sword, pick a side, and do your best to survive the night your brains un-eaten.

Whether it is above or under ground, explore the Dungeon and fight the zombies who invaded it. Which camp will you choose? The Necromancers? The Vampires? You’re the only one who can decide. Our favorite heroes are waiting for you to attack the dungeon infested by the living dead!

An amazing adventure with many laughs: you will have no time to get bored with them! Dive into the new zany adventure of the Dungeon of Naheulbeuk with Necromancers and Vampires, lead the least qualified adventurers of the whole Land of Fangh to victory despite their lack of abilities, and make them, through continued efforts and hardships, the most unlikely heroes of all times.
summary:
Experience the first ever DLC for hit RPG parody The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk!
In Ruins of Limis, the party faces a whole new batch of terrifying enemies, including vampires, zombies, necromancers and chickens. Expect new missions, challenging battles, side quests, new factions, and fresh laughs, as the unlikely heroes set out to discover the sinister secret of a haunted tavern.
